Where did you get your fuel? Prairie. 1929.

Mention any changes in the use of fuels which have taken place since you first started housekeeping, giving dates where possible. One thirty 12-13?

Having no fuel, we burned. Place straw in a metal heater. Straw stacked in & lit from the bottom, or straw burned from the bottom very little ash but wonderful heat, but not for cooking. We had a small quantity of coals from Moore farm.
